\section*{  - /about.html}

I am a Ph.D. candidate in Statistics at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST) with Prof. \href{https://cemse.kaust.edu.sa/stat/people/person/raphael-huser}{Raphaël Huser}. I obtained my bachelor degree in financial mathematics at the Southern University of Science and Technology (SUSTech), Shenzhen, China in 2017 and a master degree in Statistics at KAUST in 2018. My research is mainly focusing on modeling spatial extremes, high-dimensional inference, and Bayesian inference. In addition, I am also interested in deep learning framework, e.g. GAN and VAE (Variational Autoencoder).
